授業目的: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with the TOEFL test
到達目標:
Students will be able understand the different sections of the TOEFL test
Students will be able use planning strategies for the writing section
Students will be able to use planning strategies for the speaking section

第1回: Students will be given a writing pack and must complete it and hand it in by the final class
第2回: Textbook pages 1-19 - read, summarize and discuss.
第3回: Textbook pages 20-85 - read, summarize and discuss.
第4回: Textbook pages 101-149 - read, summarize and discuss.
第7回: Textbook pages 159-178 - read, summarize and discuss.
第13回: Prepare to hand in writing pack for next class
